body_html:
@wt-huang Thanks for your reply. But the thing is: I am trying to use mirrored strategy to do multi-gpu training. Only optimizers from tf.train are supported.

If there can be some fix on the model_to_estimator side, it would be greatly appreciated.
body_text:
@wt-huang Thanks for your reply.  But the thing is: I am trying to use mirrored strategy to do multi-gpu training. Only optimizers from tf.train are supported.
If there can be some fix on the model_to_estimator side, it would be greatly appreciated.
body:
@wt-huang Thanks for your reply.  But the thing is: I am trying to use mirrored strategy to do multi-gpu training. Only optimizers from tf.train are supported.  

If there can be some fix on the model_to_estimator side, it would be greatly appreciated.
